languages.text: "Лорд-капитан! С кораблями этих тварей мы разобрались, но на корабль высадилась абордажная группа ксеносов — прямо сейчас они уверенно продвигаются к плазмадвигателю. Охрана не справляется и запрашивает подмогу — или им помогут, или эти мракобесы угробят нам корабль изнутри!"

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, основные силы врага разбиты. Но на корабль высадилась абордажная группа ксеносов — прямо сейчас они уверенно продвигаются к плазмадвигателю. Охрана не справляктся и запрашивает подмогу. Ситуация чрезвычайная, без вашего вмешательства последствия проникновения ксеносов в жизненно важный технический отсек могут быть катастрофическими!"

languages.text: "Lord Captain! We have dealt with the voidships of these beasts, but a xenos boarding party has landed on the ship — they are advancing steadily toward the plasma drive. The enforcers are being overrun, they are asking for reinforcements — if we do not help them, this filth will destroy our vessel from the inside!"
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан! С кораблями этих тварей мы разобрались, но на корабль высадилась абордажная группа ксеносов — прямо сейчас они уверенно продвигаются к плазмадвигателю. Охрана не справляется и запрашивает подмогу — или им помогут, или эти мракобесы угробят нам корабль изнутри!"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, the main enemy forces have been defeated. But a xenos boarding party has landed on the ship — they are advancing steadily to the plasma drive. The guards are being overrun, they are asking for reinforcements. This is an emergency, without your intervention the consequences of xenos infiltrating a vital technical chamber could spell a catastrophe!"

"Lord Captain, the main enemy forces have been defeated. But a xenos boarding party has landed on the ship — they are advancing steadily to the plasma drive. The guards are being overrun, they are asking for reinforcements. This is an emergency, without your intervention the consequences of xenos infiltrating a vital technical chamber could spell a catastrophe!"

"Lord Captain! We have dealt with the voidships of these beasts, but a xenos boarding party has landed on the ship — they are advancing steadily toward the plasma drive. The guards are being overrun, they are asking for reinforcements — if we do not help this, this filth will destroy our vessel from the inside!"

"Lord Captain! We have dealt with the voidships of these beasts, but a xenos boarding party has landed on the ship — they are advancing steadily toward the plasma drive. The guards are being overrun, they are asking for reinforcements — if we do not help this, this filth will destroy our vessel from the inside!"

"Lord Captain! We have dealt with the voidships of these beasts, but a xenos boarding party has landed on the ship — they are advancing steadily toward the plasma drive. The enforcers are being overrun, they are asking for reinforcements — if we do not help this, this filth will destroy our vessel from the inside!"

languages.text: “领主舰长！我们已经击沉了这群畜生的虚空舰，但一支异形登舰队伍已经冲上了我们的船，目前正朝着等离子驱动装置前进。执法者寡不敌众，目前正在请求增援。如果我们不进行支援的话，那些该死的敌人恐怕会从内部摧毁我们的飞船！”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! We have dealt with the voidships of these beasts, but a xenos boarding party has landed on the ship — they are advancing steadily toward the plasma drive. The enforcers are being overrun, they are asking for reinforcements — if we do not help them, this filth will destroy our vessel from the inside!"

traits.locale_text: “领主舰长！我们已经击沉了这群畜生的的虚空舰，但一支异形登舰队伍已经冲上了我们的船，目前正朝着等离子驱动装置前进。镇压者寡不敌众，目前正在请求增援。如果我们不进行支援的话，那些该死的敌人恐怕会从内部摧毁我们的飞船！”
“领主舰长！我们已经击沉了这群畜生的虚空舰，但一支异形登舰队伍已经冲上了我们的船，目前正朝着等离子驱动装置前进。执法者寡不敌众，目前正在请求增援。如果我们不进行支援的话，那些该死的敌人恐怕会从内部摧毁我们的飞船！”

languages.text: «¡Lord Capitán! Nos hemos encargado de las naves del vacío de esas bestias, pero un equipo de abordaje xenos se ha infiltrado en nuestra nave... y avanza hacia el motor de plasma. Los guardias no pueden detenerlos y solicitan refuerzos; ¡si no les ayudamos, esa escoria destruirá nuestra nave desde dentro!».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! We have dealt with the voidships of these beasts, but a xenos boarding party has landed on the ship — they are advancing steadily toward the plasma drive. The enforcers are being overrun, they are asking for reinforcements — if we do not help them, this filth will destroy our vessel from the inside!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Lord Capitán! Nos hemos encargado de las naves del vacío de esas bestias, pero un equipo de abordaje xenos se ha infiltrado en nuestra nave... y avanza hacia el motor de plasma. Los guardias no pueden detenerlos y solicitan refuerzos; ¡si no les ayudamos, esa escoria destruirá nuestra nave desde dentro!».

languages.text: "Lord Captain! Wir haben uns um die Raumschiffe dieser Bestien gekümmert, aber eine Entermannschaft der Xenos ist auf dem Schiff gelandet ... und rückt kontinuierlich zum Plasmatriebwerk vor. Die Enforcer werden überrannt und bitten um Verstärkung ... wenn wir ihnen nicht helfen, wird dieser Abschaum unser Schiff von innen heraus zerstören!"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! We have dealt with the voidships of these beasts, but a xenos boarding party has landed on the ship — they are advancing steadily toward the plasma drive. The enforcers are being overrun, they are asking for reinforcements — if we do not help them, this filth will destroy our vessel from the inside!"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain! Wir haben uns um die Raumschiffe dieser Bestien gekümmert, aber eine Entermannschaft der Xenos ist auf dem Schiff gelandet ... und rückt kontinuierlich zum Plasmatriebwerk vor. Die Enforcer werden überrannt und bitten um Verstärkung ... wenn wir ihnen nicht helfen, wird dieser Abschaum unser Schiff von innen heraus zerstören!"

"Lord Captain! Wir haben uns um die Raumschiffe dieser Bestien gekümmert, aber eine Entermannschaft der Xenos ist auf dem Schiff gelandet ... und rückt kontinuierlich zum Plasmatriebwerk vor. Die Enforcer werden überrannt und bitten um Verstärkung ... wenn wir ihnen nicht helfen, wird dieser Abschaum unser Schiff von innen heraus zerstören!"

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! Nous avons neutralisé les vaisseaux de ces créatures, mais un groupe d'abordage xénos est monté à bord et se dirige vers le réacteur à plasma. Les prévôts sont dépassés et demandent des renforts. Si nous n'intervenons pas, cette vermine détruira notre vaisseau de l'intérieur ! »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! We have dealt with the voidships of these beasts, but a xenos boarding party has landed on the ship — they are advancing steadily toward the plasma drive. The enforcers are being overrun, they are asking for reinforcements — if we do not help them, this filth will destroy our vessel from the inside!"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! Nous avons neutralisé les vaisseaux de ces créatures, mais un groupe d'abordage xénos est monté à bord et se dirige vers le réacteur à plasma. Les prévôts sont dépassés et demandent des renforts. Si nous n'intervenons pas, cette vermine détruira notre vaisseau de l'intérieur ! »

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン！ケダモノのヴォイドシップに応戦しましたが、異種族の搭乗部隊が船に乗り込みました。敵はプラズマドライブに向かってどんどん進んでいます。エンフォーサーは押されていて、援軍を求めています。ここで手を差し伸べなければ、あの汚物達に内側から破壊されてしまいます！」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! We have dealt with the voidships of these beasts, but a xenos boarding party has landed on the ship — they are advancing steadily toward the plasma drive. The enforcers are being overrun, they are asking for reinforcements — if we do not help them, this filth will destroy our vessel from the inside!"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン！ケダモノのヴォイドシップに応戦しましたが、異種族の搭乗部隊が船に乗り込みました。敵はプラズマドライブに向かってどんどん進んでいます。エンフォーサーは押されていて、援軍を求めています。ここで手を差し伸べなければ、あの汚物達に内側から破壊されてしまいます！」
「ロード・キャプテン！ケダモノのヴォイドシップに応戦しましたが、異種族の搭乗部隊が船に乗り込みましたーー敵はプラズマドライブに向かってどんどん進んでいます。執行官は押されていて、援軍を求めていますーーここで手を差し伸べなければ、あの汚物達に内側から破壊されてしまいます！」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan! Bu canavarların uçsuz gemilerinin icabına baktık ama gemiye bir zeno bordalama ekibi giriş yaptı. Plazma iticisine doğru istikrarlı bir şekilde ilerliyorlar. İnfazcılar alt ediliyor. Takviye birlikler istiyorlar. Yardımcı olmazsak bu pislikler, gemimizi içten yok edecek!"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain! We have dealt with the voidships of these beasts, but a xenos boarding party has landed on the ship — they are advancing steadily toward the plasma drive. The enforcers are being overrun, they are asking for reinforcements — if we do not help them, this filth will destroy our vessel from the inside!"
